description:
With over 90 minutes of focussed training on Steinberg's drum VSTi Groove Agent 4, you'll be up and running in next to no time.

Throughout this time, you will learn about the following.

Groove Agent 4 combines the creative power of 3 different rhythm modules: the Acoustic, Beat, and Percussion Agents.

Each of these tools offers its own approach to drums and rhythms, with special ways of creating your own inspiring beats in a huge range of styles.

The creative potential of each agent can be combined with any of the others.

4 agent slots allow you to mix and match your ideal rhythm section or combine Acoustic Agent and Beat Agent to create ultra-modern hybrid beats.

Steinberg release many extension / expander packs for Groove Agent 4.

With the fourth incarnation of Steinberg's drum VSTi, Groove Agent is a revamped instrument that raises the level of quality, functionality, and authenticity.

The whole GA4 library has been created from scratch to meet the requirements of contemporary music producers, for both acoustic and electronic music productions.

Many innovative features have found their way into the new version to enhance the initial design that made Groove Agent exceptional in its class.

You will learn:

1 How to use GA4

2 How to Integrate with your DAW

3 How to use the program

4 How to implement it
title: Introducing 'Groove Agent 4'
